Analyze the provided stories and generate a relevance score from 0.0 to 1.0 for each, where 1.0 is most relevant.
Your output MUST be a valid JSON array containing exactly two objects. Each object must have the following keys: "id", "customerName", "relevanceScore", and "summary".
